product_name: La Roche-PosaySerozinc Mattifying Facial Toner Spray
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganLa Roche-Posay Serozinc Mattifying Facial Toner Spray helps reduce the appearance of shine for oily and sensitive skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsClear water-like mist targets oiliness and poresAllergy TestedKey IngredientsFeatures zinc sulfate, specifically designed to target key signs of oily skinFormulated WithoutFragranceOilItem 2620403How To UseStep 1: Close eyes and spray onto skin after cleansing.Step 2: Let absorb into skin.Step 3: Gently pat off any excess.Can be applied before or after makeup as a setting spray.IngredientsAqua/Water, Zinc Sulfate, Sodium Chloride.
how_to_use: Step 1: Close eyes and spray onto skin after cleansing.Step 2: Let absorb into skin.Step 3: Gently pat off any excess.Can be applied before or after makeup as a setting spray.

reviews.headline: Does Nothing
reviews.comments: Says it's supposed to target excess shine/oily skin. If anything, my skin was EXTRA oily after using this product

reviews.headline: Thought it was helping
reviews.comments: Was using and thought it was calming down my perioral dermatitis, but then the nozzle stopped working and the bottle is still half full. Wish we could execute products in better packaging. Ends up being a complete waste of product, money, and cant recycle! Frustrating.

reviews.headline: Not good for acne prone skin
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this product cause it was goving me really smooth skin but after a week of using it, it started giving me really big pimples

faceoff_positive.comments: First off the spray comes out so amazing; it is fine and evenly applies to your skin. It really helps to soothe any irritation and inflamed skin. It also keeps my skin balanced since I have combo oily skin that is acne prone. I learned that since it helps with inflamed skin, it is super helpful if you get a bug bite because it helps to reduce the redness and itchy skin. Finally it is really soothing if you get too much sun and have a sunburn. Can't say enough good things about this product.
faceoff_positive.headline: Excellent spray toner/mist

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was really excited to try this product and especially this brand! Let's start off with a few positives! The first is that the mister on this is amazing and produces a really fine mist. The product also has no scent which is perfect for sensitive skin. The product also leaves your face refreshed without a sticky feeling. 
Now let's talk about the negatives. This product did absolutely nothing for my skin. I used it for two weeks daily as recommended on the packaging. It reminds me of the Evian mist in that it's literally just water meant for 5 minutes of feeling refreshed. I was disappointed because this product is not cheap and I would expect to do more for my skin. I noticed no long term or even short term benefits of using this product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Doesn't do much
